title: Cabinet Memorandum for Agreement on Establishment of the SAARC Seed Bank in Sri Lanka
decision_details:
- the objectives of setting up of the Seed Bank, as agreed upon by SAARC countries, are -

*	to provide regional support to National Seed Security efforts; address regional seed shortages through collective actions and foster inter-country partnership;

*	to promote increase of Seed Replacement Rate with appropriate varieties at a faster rate as far as possible so that the use of quality seeds for crop production can be ensured; and,

		*	to act as a Regional Seed Security reserve for the Member States. 

	The proposal made Hon. Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena, Minister of Agriculture, to sign the above Agreement, was approved by the Cabinet.
